product_name: Cloud Star Dynamo Dog Functional Treats
long_description: Cloud Star Dynamo Dog Functional Treats come in three healthy, fun and tasty formulas to help your dog look and feel its best. Hip & Joint: Contains glucosamine and chondroitin especially for dogs who run and jump frequently every day (Bacon & Cheese flavor). Skin & Coat: Contains salmon oil and vitamin E supplement to help keep your dog's skin healthy and coat glossy (Salmon Flavor). Tummy: Contains probiotics, ginger, and fiber from pumpkin to help ease digestion (Pumpkin & Ginger Flavor). In addition, each formula contains specially selected fruits, vegetables, and herbs. Dynamo Dog Functional Treats are grain free, gluten free, contain no corn, wheat, soy, byproducts or artificial flavors, and are always made in the USA of fresh ingredients.
short_description: Cloud Star Dynamo Dog Functional Treats come in three healthy, fun and tasty formulas to help your dog look and feel its best.
